name: Pokemon Go Fest Chicago 2019
description: Explore Pokemon habitats within Chicago's iconic Grant Park with thousands of Trainers from around the world. Attend Pokemon GO Fest 2019 on Thursday June 13th, Friday June 14th, Saturday June 15th, or Sunday June 16th. All days will offer the same enhanced experience but you can only choose one.

name: Research Breakthroughs - May-June
description: Lugia, Ho-Oh, Latias, and Latios will be Research Breakthrough encounters starting May 1, 2019, at 1 p.m. PDT (GMT −7) through the end of June.

name: Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf Surface in Regional Raids
description:
We received numerous reports from all over the world of Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf. Your work uncovering the mystery of these Legendary Pokemon from the Sinnoh region has led to an amazing discovery! Professor Willow has verified that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf have appeared in different regions of the world and will be available to challenge in raids!

Thank you for your work in helping to identify these Legendary Pokemon newly discovered in Pokemon GO. Keep exploring, Trainers!
bonuses: Asia-Pacific: Uxie will be available to challenge in raids
Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and India: Mesprit will be available to challenge in raids
The Americas and Greenland: Azelf will be available to challenge in raids
If you’re extraordinarily lucky, you may encounter these extremely rare Legendary Pokemon in the wild in their different regions, even after the event!

name: Pokemon Go Fest Dortmund 2019
description: Explore Pokemon habitats within Dortmund's iconic Westfalenpark with thousands of Trainers from around the world. Attend Pokemon GO Fest 2019 on Thursday July 4th, Friday July 5th, Saturday July 6th, or Sunday July 7th. All days will offer the same enhanced experience but you can only choose one.

name: Jump-start your Summer with Extraordinary Raid Week!
description:
Trainers,

Get ready for the summer with a special week of events! Prep your best teams, and get your Raid Passes ready for our upcoming Extraordinary Raid Week. To test your battle skills, we have a full week of exciting raids for you to show off your Trainer prowess.

This is your chance to add some awesome Pokemon like Tyranitar or Metagross to your team. We hope you’re up for the challenge, Trainers!

Let’s GO raid!

name: Jump-start your Summer with Extraordinary Raid Week! - Lapras Raid Day
description:
The Transport Pokemon, Lapras, will be joining Raid Battles for this event.

Receive up to five Raid Passes from Gyms at no cost.

If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny Lapras!

name: Community Day - June 2019
description: Get out and play together in your local community parks on Pokemon GO Community Day. For just a few hours each month, you can encounter a special Pokemon in the wild. During these hours, there’s a chance to learn a previously unavailable move for that Pokemon or its Evolution, as well as earn some Community Day bonuses. Celebrate what it means to be a part of the Pokemon GO community and make new friends along the way!

name: A legendary return - Cresselia reawakens in raids!
description:
Trainers,

We hope you’re enjoying Extraordinary Raid Week so far! We’re excited to announce the next three Legendary Pokémon you can look forward to seeing in five-star Raid Battles. Expect to see some Legendary Pokémon return—riled up and ready to battle!

**Cresselia**
This Psychic-type Legendary Pokémon is said to represent the crescent moon, but don’t let its graceful exterior lull you during battle. Psychic-type Pokémon are weak against Bug-, Ghost-, and Dark-type Pokémon, so be sure to have those ready!

This is your chance to catch Kyogre, Groudon, and Cresselia! It’ll be tough, but we have faith in you, Trainers. Legendary Pokémon only appear when the time is right—this must be fate. Are you ready to be a Battle Legend? Show us what you’ve got!
bonuses: If the workings of the cosmos are in your favor, you may encounter a Shiny Cresselia!

name: A legendary return - Kyogre reawakens in raids!
description:
Trainers,

We hope you’re enjoying Extraordinary Raid Week so far! We’re excited to announce the next three Legendary Pokémon you can look forward to seeing in five-star Raid Battles. Expect to see some Legendary Pokémon return—riled up and ready to battle!

**Kyogre**
The Sea Basin Pokémon is said to have widened the seas and waged battle with Groudon. This Water-type Pokémon is weak against Grass- and Electric-type Pokémon. Can you earn this powerful creature’s trust and convince it to battle alongside you?

This is your chance to catch Kyogre, Groudon, and Cresselia! It’ll be tough, but we have faith in you, Trainers. Legendary Pokémon only appear when the time is right—this must be fate. Are you ready to be a Battle Legend? Show us what you’ve got!
bonuses: Fortune favors the bold—you may encounter a Shiny Kyogre!

name: A legendary return - Groudon reawakens in raids!
description:
Trainers,

We hope you’re enjoying Extraordinary Raid Week so far! We’re excited to announce the next three Legendary Pokémon you can look forward to seeing in five-star Raid Battles. Expect to see some Legendary Pokémon return—riled up and ready to battle!

**Groudon**
Groudon is said to have dueled titanically with Kyogre before falling into a deep slumber. It’s a Ground-type Pokémon, so, Trainers, this means Water-, Grass-, and Ice-type Pokémon are your best bets for defeating this powerful opponent!

This is your chance to catch Kyogre, Groudon, and Cresselia! It’ll be tough, but we have faith in you, Trainers. Legendary Pokémon only appear when the time is right—this must be fate. Are you ready to be a Battle Legend? Show us what you’ve got!
bonuses: Keep persevering, Trainer—you may encounter a Shiny Groudon!
